title.narrative: Finnpartnership: Creative Education Framework for Nigerian schools with Finnish Pedagogy

description.narrative: The main purpose of the project is to design a framework for Nigerian schools to restructure the connections of the stakeholders of the education system. It include designing developing and delivering the competency development program for school teachers leadership and support staff in those schools. The new teaching methods will be based on the concepts of creativity and some parts of Finnish pedagogy. During this time we will also design a ICT based system using exisiting tools through which parents and society get connected to the school in enriched way. As of now these two factors are missing in the educational activities of the school. Our offerings also include collaborative educational support which means designing the framework for the Nigerian scho ols for better use of the tools and other technology in their routine activities of teaching as well as activities of administration. The outcome of the offerings will be certified which we will design during the this process.Future of the project:CCE plan to establish a subsidiary company in Nigeria OR identify a local partnet to handle the local activities in long term (This will be decided after feasibility and market study).Benefits for Finland:? Extended footprints of Finnish education in Nigerian mark et? Opening up long term collaboration possibilities between Nigerian and Finnish companies active in educational development? Internationalisation of Finnish education? Employment generation? Exchange of know-howBenefits for Nigeria:? Local employment gen eration to handle the ground activities and some part of trainings ( Long term employment will be generated after the establishment of a subsidiary company)? Better training facilities and teacher education will be available? Development in designing the e -learning environment? Production of local ICT tools and technology suitable to Nigerian needs
